issue.title: Consider using Eigen to improve math::Matrix classes

content.raw: The instabilities arose when I used the subtraction operator of the `math::Pose` class when doing some simple Cartesian servoing. I could probably put together a self-contained repro next week. I ended up just converting everything to `math::Matrix4` objects and doing it manually.
content.html: The instabilities arose when I used the subtraction operator of the math::Pose class when doing some simple Cartesian servoing. I could probably put together a self-contained repro next week. I ended up just converting everything to math::Matrix4 objects and doing it manually.
